wikipedia.title: Hot in Herre
wikipedia.extract:
"Hot in Herre" is a song by American rapper Nelly from his second studio album Nellyville (2002). It was released on April 16, 2002, by Universal Records as the second single from the project and features additional vocals by former labelmate Dani Stevenson. The song was produced by The Neptunes.
"Hot in Herre" incorporates the hook from go-go performer Chuck Brown's 1979 single "Bustin' Loose".
